title: Tuning
content:
Tuning is a mechanism that enhances and locks the weapon to a region. Untuned items are unuseable until they have been tuned at an obelisk. Players can find an obelisk in each region. Unlike regular drops, untuned equipment can be tuned and locked to the region of the obelisk. Once tuned, an item cannot be untuned or tuned do a different region.


 * Hopeport Obelisk, safe-zone. Unlocked by completing the The Obelisk quest
 * Hopeforest Goblin Camp, surrounded by aggressive Goblins
